title: South African Metal Compilation - Hammer The Masses (2008)
description:
ARTIST.....: Select South African Metal Bands                                TITLE......: Hammer the Masses - 2008                                        LABEL......: DUAL Records                                                                                         
                                               
STORE DATE.: Mar - 2008                                                      
GENRE......: Metal/Death/Metalcore/Hardcore/Alt                              
QUALITY....: 256kbps                                       
SIZE.......: 122 MB  

                                                        
Tracks: Song Title (Artist): 

 01 - It All Ends In Tragedy (Enmity)                             03:12          
 02 - The Sorrow Cycle (The Doppler Effect)                       04:39          
 03 - This Hole Is Where My Heart Used To Be (Unforsaken Truth)   04:04          
 04 - For The Broken (Betray The Emissary)                        03:38          
 05 - Mariana (Your Name In Neon)                                 06:38          
 06 - Awaken This (21st Century Tradgedy)                         03:33          
 07 - Child Soldier (Contrast The Water)                          03:53          
 08 - My Donker (Mind Assault)                                    03:52          
 09 - Bring Your Guns (Suicide Kings)                             04:04 
 10 - Close Enough To Hear Your Heart Beat (New Altum)            03:33         
 11 - The Graveyard Shift (Azail)                                 04:25          
 12 - Sands Of Qrue (Enmity)                                      04:02          
 13 - Divided Paths (The Horror Cast)                             03:57          
 14 - Reward (Hell To Pay)                                        03:33          
 15 - Hope Bleeds From The Eyes (Death Of A Rival)                04:23          
 16 - Faith Be My Blade (Tide Of Silence) [Bonus Track]           05:02                                                       


    Hammer The Masses Vol. 1 is a way to give South African Metal Bands the 
    exposure they deserve.  South African metalheads - if you see this album,    
    then buy it!  Also, look out for the featured bands recorded materials and   
   live gigs - and get there! To the rest of the world - listen up - South Africa          has some metal for ya!
